Header: 53 Division Completes One More Training Course
Content: 35 Army personnel who completed the Regimental Accounts-keeping Course No 3 at 53 Division Headquarters, Inamaluwa Habarana received their certificates of proficiency during a brief ceremony held on Monday (6) at 53 Division Headquarters. Major General A.A Kodippili, General Officer Commanding, 53 Division as the Chief Guest attended the award ceremony, together with several Senior Officers. 35 Army personnel belonging to Brigades and Units followed the Course No 3 and received knowledge in this regard.
